title: Tours in Scotland 1677 & 1681. By T. Kirk and R. Thoresby. Edited by P. Hume Brown
author: Kirk, Thomas
snippet: 1 This interesting relic of the family of Keith, known as "The black storkof Dunottar," is now in Ravelston House, near Corstorphine. The followinginscription, engraved on a silver plate, gives its history :—
